thread.title: Local pet food company gaining national attention
thread.title_full: Local pet food company gaining national attention - KPTV - FOX 12

author: FOX 12 Staff
title: Local pet food company gaining national attention
text:
PORTLAND, OR (KPTV) - A local pet food company is making waves with its all natural dog food and treats.
The new start up is already getting some national attention.
Portland Pet Food has been named a finalist in the Martha Stewart American Made competition.
The award recognizes companies using American products and ingredients.
Portland Pet Food said all of their dog food and treats have fresh and tasty ingredients.
"The meat we use is high quality and something you would find in a lot of restaurants," said Katie McCarron, who founded the company. "Just like myself, I want to make sure that dogs are being fed wholesome food. I want to make sure they are getting the ingredients they need each day in a wholesome diet."
The Portland Pet Food company is sold in 50 stores up and down the west coast.
